overview: Age is just a number in the romantic comedy Born to Love You. Hong Kong singer-actor Julian Cheung (Natural Born Lovers) and Super Girl finalist Fu Mengni form an unlikely couple in this lighthearted love story between a middle-aged man, who is still hurting from a past romance, and an 18-year-old singer discovering love for the first time. Helmed by new-generation director Hu Chongxi, Born to Love You also co-stars singer Lisa Guo and Hong Kong actress Yvonne Yung.
title: Born To Love You
